import React from "react"; import "../css/SignUp.css"; import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function SignUp() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "" }); const [err, setErr] = useState(""); const onChangeInput = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }); setErr(""); }; const registerSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const res = await axios.post("/user/register", { username: user.name, email: user.email, password: user.password, }) } catch (err) { err.response.data.msg && setErr(err.response.data.msg); } }; return (

Sign Up!

); } export default SignUp;
